instructions: On your Android device, open the image gallery. Refer to your device's manual to see exactly where your gallery is since each flavor of Android is slightly different. Open the image. Click the three dots in the upper right. Select Print . Under Select a printer, choose Save as PDF . q Follow the instructions for your device. Choose a name for your file and click Save .

Upload the file to Google Drive. Open the image. Click the three dots in the upper right. Select Print in the menu. In the Printer menu, select Save as PDF . Click the blue PDF icon. Choose a name for your PDF and tap Save . The PDF is saved to your phone's storage location, which may vary based on your Android version.

Open the Photos app. Tap the image you want to convert. You can also select multiple images to convert by tapping Select , then choose all the images you want to convert. Tap the share icon in the lower left. Press the Printer icon. You may have to scroll through your sharing options depending on the apps you normally share images with. Scroll to the image preview at the bottom of the screen. Pinch the preview with your fingers and spread them out to access the hidden Share option in the upper-right corner. Tap the Share icon again, then Save to Files. Choose iCloud Drive, On My iPhone, or any other locations you wish. Follow the instructions as needed for the save location.
